title: Number to Binary | Challenge
description: In computer science, binary is a base-2 numbering system that represents numeric values using two symbols, typically 0 and 1. Binary is widely used in computing and digital electronics. In this challenge, you will write a Python function that takes a decimal number as input and returns its binary representation.

meta.title: Master Binary Conversion with Python
meta.description: Learn how to write a Python function that converts decimal numbers to their binary representation. Explore the fundamentals of the binary numbering system and its applications in computing.
meta.keywords: python playground, coding challenge, python, binary conversion, decimal to binary, python programming
